sourcesContent: /* eslint-disable global-require */ /* eslint-disable import/no-dynamic-require */ import React from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import "../../../../style" import { Img, PropCard, Location, Days, Line, CardTitle, CardPrice, } from "../styles/PrompCard" // eslint-disable-next-line react/prop-types const PromCard = ({ source, title, price, city, slug, days, noLink }) => ( <> {noLink ? ( ) : ( {title} {days > 1 ? {days} Days : {days} Day} AUD {price} {city} )} ) export default PromCard
